text: Answer: (a) and (c) Solution: (a) Can be concluded: As relationship is many to one, Professor can advised many students but a student can be co-advised by only 1 professor. (b) Can't be concluded: As figure is in many to 1 relationship with paper. () Can be concluded: As title is not unique attribute thus 2 papers can have same title. (d) Can't be concluded: As person is A relationship is not total thus a_Person can be someone else also apart front students and professor.
